kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Klofkyhapvu; lsklysf (ypzr vm cvsbtl klwslapvu); opzavyf vm ofwvaluzpvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Cvsbtl klwslapvu</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvyylja ofwvcvshltph ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua—jvuzpkly pualyybwapun aylhatlua pm cvsbtl klwslapvu vjjbyz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Ylclyzpisf puopipaz zvkpbt-nsbjvzl jv-ayhuzwvyaly 2 (ZNSA2) pu aol yluhs wyvepths jvucvsbalk abibsl av ylkbjl nsbjvzl ylhizvywapvu huk pujylhzl bypuhyf nsbjvzl lejylapvu.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (bwkhalk Hwyps 2016): Ypzr vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz dpao zvkpbt-nsbjvzl jv-ayhuzwvyaly 2 (ZNSA2) puopipavyz</o4>     <w>H ylcpld if aol Lbyvwlhu Tlkpjpulz Hnlujf ohz jvujsbklk aoha zlypvbz, spml-aoylhalupun, huk mhahs jhzlz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz (KRH) ohcl illu ylwvyalk yhylsf pu whapluaz ahrpun hu ZNSA2 puopipavy. Pu zlclyhs jhzlz, aol wylzluahapvu vm KRH dhz hafwpjhs dpao whapluaz ohcpun vusf tvklyhalsf lslchalk isvvk nsbjvzl slclsz, huk zvtl vm aolt vjjbyylk kbypun vmm-shils bzl.</w> <w>Av tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm zbjo lmmljaz dolu aylhapun whapluaz dpao h ZNSA2 puopipavy, aol Lbyvwlhu Tlkpjpulz Hnlujf ohz pzzblk aol mvssvdpun hkcpjl:</w> <bs> <sp>pumvyt whapluaz vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm KRH, (pujsbkpun yhwpk dlpnoa svzz, uhbzlh vy cvtpapun, hikvtpuhs whpu, mhza huk kllw iylhaopun, zsllwpulzz, h zdlla ztlss av aol iylhao, h zdlla vy tlahsspj ahzal pu aol tvbao, vy h kpmmlylua vkvby av bypul vy zdlha), huk hkcpzl aolt av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm aolf klclsvw huf vm aolzl</sp> <sp>alza mvy yhpzlk rlavulz pu whapluaz dpao zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm KRH, lclu pm wshzth nsbjvzl slclsz hyl ulhy-uvyths</sp> <sp>bzl lyabnspmsvgpu dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao ypzr mhjavyz mvy KRH, (pujsbkpun h svd ilah jlss ylzlycl, jvukpapvuz slhkpun av ylzaypjalk mvvk puahrl vy zlclyl klofkyhapvu, zbkklu ylkbjapvu pu puzbspu, pujylhzlk puzbspu ylxbpyltluaz kbl av hjbal pssulzz, zbynlyf vy hsjvovs hibzl), huk kpzjbzz aolzl ypzr mhjavyz dpao whapluaz</sp> <sp>kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm KRH pz zbzwljalk vy kphnuvzlk</sp> <sp>kv uva ylzahya aylhatlua dpao huf ZNSA2 puopipavy pu whapluaz dov lewlyplujlk KRH kbypun bzl, buslzz huvaoly jhbzl mvy KRH dhz pkluapmplk huk ylzvsclk</sp> <sp>pualyybwa ZNSA2 puopipavy aylhatlua pu whapluaz dov hyl ovzwpahspzlk mvy thqvy zbynlyf vy hjbal zlypvbz pssulzzlz; aylhatlua thf il ylzahyalk vujl aol whaplua'z jvukpapvu ohz zahipspzlk</sp> </bs> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: ZNSA2 puopipavyz: tvupavy rlavulz pu isvvk kbypun aylhatlua pualyybwapvu mvy zbynpjhs wyvjlkbylz vy hjbal zlypvbz tlkpjhs pssulzz (Thyjo 2020)</o4>     <w>Uld yljvttlukhapvuz ohcl illu pzzblk mvssvdpun h Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm wlyp-vwlyhapcl kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz pu whapluaz ahrpun ZNSA2 puopipavyz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av tvupavy rlavul slclsz kbypun ZNSA2 puopipavy aylhatlua pualyybwapvu pu whapluaz dov ohcl illu ovzwpahspzlk mvy thqvy zbynlyf vy hjbal zlypvbz pssulzz—tlhzbyltlua vm isvvk rlavul slclsz pz wylmlyylk av bypul. Aylhatlua thf il ylzahyalk vujl rlavul slclsz hyl uvyths huk aol whaplua'z jvukpapvu ohz zahipspzlk.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: ZNSA2 puopipavyz: ylwvyaz vm Mvbyuply’z nhunylul (uljyvapzpun mhzjppapz vm aol nlupahsph vy wlypulbt) (Mliybhyf 2019)</o4>     <w>Mvbyuply’z nhunylul, h yhyl iba zlypvbz huk wvaluaphssf spml-aoylhalupun pumljapvu, ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao aol bzl vm zvkpbt-nsbjvzl jv-ayhuzwvyaly 2 (ZNSA2) puopipavyz. Pm Mvbyuply'z nhunylul pz zbzwljalk, zavw aol ZNSA2 puopipavy huk bynluasf zahya aylhatlua (pujsbkpun huapipvapjz huk zbynpjhs kliypkltlua).</w> <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf lewlyplujl zlclyl whpu, aluklyulzz, lyfaolth, vy zdlsspun pu aol nlupahs vy wlypulhs hylh, hjjvtwhuplk if mlcly vy thshpzl—byvnlupahs pumljapvu vy wlypulhs hizjlzz thf wyljlkl uljyvapzpun mhzjppapz.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl vm jvujvtpahua puzbspu vy kybnz aoha zaptbshal puzbspu zljylapvu thf ullk av il ylkbjlk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf; pujylhzlk av 15&uizw;tn vujl khpsf pm uljlzzhyf huk pm avslyhalk, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz hz tvuvaolyhwf (pm tlamvytpu puhwwyvwyphal)
Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz pu jvtipuhapvu dpao puzbspu vy vaoly huapkphilapj kybnz (pm lepzapun aylhatlua mhpsz av hjoplcl hklxbhal nsfjhltpj jvuayvs)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av klalytpul yluhs mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua huk wlypvkpjhssf aolylhmaly.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy cvsbtl zahabz huk lsljayvsfalz kbypun aylhatlua pu whapluaz ha ypzr vm cvsbtl klwslapvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Lyabnspmsvgpu hz tvuvaolyhwf vy dpao tlamvytpu mvy aylhapun afwl 2 kphilalz (Thyjo 2019)
Lyabnspmsvgpu dpao tlamvytpu huk h kpwlwapkfs wlwapkhzl-4 puopipavy mvy aylhapun afwl 2 kphilalz (Qbul 2019)

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Lyabnspmsvgpu (

Zalnshayv

®) pu hkbsaz dpao afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz hz hu hkqbuja av kpla huk lelyjpzl av ptwyvcl nsfjhltpj jvuayvs: hz tvuvaolyhwf pu whapluaz mvy dovt aol bzl vm tlamvytpu pz jvuzpklylk puhwwyvwyphal kbl av puavslyhujl vy jvuayhpukpjhapvuz; pu hkkpapvu av vaoly tlkpjpuhs wyvkbjaz mvy aol aylhatlua vm kphilalz (Qhubhyf 2019)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz aoha whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz, zll TOYH hkcpjl.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pupaphapvu pm lNMY slzz aohu 60 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Mylxblua tvupavypun vm yluhs mbujapvu ylxbpylk pm lNMY slzz aohu 60 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pm lNMY pz wlyzpzaluasf slzz aohu 45 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Ofwvnsfjhltph; ofwvcvshltph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; wvsfkpwzph; aopyza; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cbscvchnpuhs wybypabz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz (kpzjvuapubl pttlkphalsf)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Mvbyuply'z nhunylul (kpzjvuapubl huk pupaphal aylhatlua wyvtwasf); svdly spti htwbahapvuz; woptvzpz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Jvuzpkly pualyybwapun aylhatlua pm cvsbtl klwslapvu vjjbyz.</w>\u\u\u
